title:
ADDING APPLICATIONS 


To add an application, provide the application name or the path to the .exe file.

Example: Firefox or C:\Users\user_name\Firefox.exe

ADDING WEB ADDRESSES 


To add a web address, provide the full web address.

Example: https://github.com

ADDING FILES 


To add a file, provide the full file path.

Example: C:\Users\user_name\your_file

ADDING DIRECTORIES 


To add a directory, provide the full directory path.

Example: C:\Users\user_name\your_directory
